channel.title: [PI] can somebody help?
channel.description:
can somebody help me and not just read it.. please.. i want to add tormented demons i ripped it from another server and the npc was 1976 and it was mugger i added anims for it but when i attack it it freezes client and doesn't log out so i have to turn off server.
EDIT: the korasi works but theres no spec bar i added in the anim for the spec but theres no bar..
IF YOUR READING THIS, PLEASE HELP I NEED THIS BADLY

item.title: [PI] can somebody help?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

im using empirescape v2, i didnt spawn it in-game i just put it in spawn.config but the client doesnt show me a cmd so i cant see the error

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] can somebody help?
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

I know what your talking about and you didn’t do anything. Theres a base out there called OricaleX and its glitched. When you run the client after about 15-35 seconds it freezes. I’m pretty sure your using this client because what you edited would not freeze your client unless you tryed spawning the NPC and if you did something wrong to the NPC. But from what you tell us you didn’t do anything wrong.

Read full topic
